Edit the config. A default config will be created if it doesn't exist

Command Flags:

  --editor : path to editor
    type : string
    default : vi
    configpath : editor
    envvars : [EDITOR]
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by envvar) : emacs

Inherited Section Flags:

  --color : Use ANSI colors
    type : string
    choices : [true false auto]
    default : auto
    envvars : [WARG_COLOR]
    currentvalue (set by appdefault) : auto

  --help , -h : Print help
    type : string
    choices : [allcommands default detailed outline]
    default : default
    currentvalue (set by appdefault) : default


Footer:

Examples:

	# Use defaults
	grabbit config edit

	# Override defaults
	grabbit config edit --config-path /path/to/config --editor code
